definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Woods never liked the black widow this is gratitude toward her smiling.
sentences.chinese: 呜兹从来都不喜欢黑寡妇，这次却感激地朝着她笑了。

sentences.english: Heavy seas broke over the bows.
sentences.chinese: 惊涛骇浪朝着船头冲打过来。

sentences.english: For the first time, I felt like I was running into the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次感到自己正在朝着原野方向奔跑。

sentences.english: It was half past ten. Sarie watched the path anxiously .
sentences.chinese: 十点半钟的时候，莎莉焦急地朝着小路张望。

sentences.english: Deryck and I are separating and moving forward on a positive note.
sentences.chinese: 德里克和我已经分居，我们正朝着积极的方向努力。

sentences.english: He approached the hut; its door consisted of a very low and narrow aperture.
sentences.chinese: 他朝着那茅棚走去，它的门只是一个狭而很低的洞。

sentences.english: A move to fiscal union is [a closing] of this loophole.
sentences.chinese: 朝着财政联盟的推进是一种堵住这一漏洞的做法。

sentences.english: "Janice, " Minmei said, approaching her former partner.
sentences.chinese: “贾妮斯，”明美朝着她之前的搭档走过去。

sentences.english: He trotted to the door, saw it was cocked open, and positioned himself to one side.
sentences.chinese: 他朝着门跑去，看它已经被打开，并把自己置于一边。

sentences.english: STOCKTON slowly turns to face his wife.
sentences.chinese: 斯道克顿慢慢地转过身来，脸朝着妻子。

sentences.english: The elephant was standing eight yards from the road, his left side towards us.
sentences.chinese: 那头象站在路边八码远的地方，左侧朝着我们。

sentences.english: It faces east, toward a sun temple at its feet .
sentences.chinese: 它所面临的东，朝着太阳寺在其英尺。

sentences.english: The mother is not good at words, always well towards our smile.
sentences.chinese: 船娘不擅言辞，总是呵呵地朝着我们笑。

sentences.english: Desktop computer will be must develop toward fixable location and requirement way.
sentences.chinese: 台式电脑也必将朝着固化位置与需求的方向发展。

sentences.english: The shop has frontages on two busy streets.
sentences.chinese: 这商店朝着两条热闹的街道。

definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
in big strides/(fig.) in giant steps
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
to reassign sb to a different job/to turn around/to change direction/to make a U turn
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to aim at/to target/to point at/to be directed at/registration/alignment (mechanical engineering)
